description: This file defines a Flutter widget named StaffFormDialog used for adding or editing staff member details in a kindergarten management system. It includes form fields for staff information such as name, email, phone, role, department, hire date, qualifications, and emergency contact, along with logic for validation, date selection, and submitting data through a provider.

classes.name: StaffFormDialog
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that presents a dialog form for creating or editing a staff member's details.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes text controllers with existing staff data if available.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes the text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dialog, including the form fields, buttons, and layout.

methods.name: _selectDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker dialog to select hire date.

methods.name: _saveStaff
methods.description: Validates form inputs, creates a Staff object, and calls the provider to add or update the staff record, with error handling and user feedback.
